item.title: git-top-committers
item.description: Ever been working in some code and wonder who you can ask about it without hopping over to github? This is probably kinda obvious (but wasn’t obvious to me at the time): alias git-top-committers='git shortlog -s -n --' Example: ~/src/nomad(main) ‚ùØ git-top-committers 4353 Alex Dadgar 2321 Michael Schurter 1799 Michael Lange 1731 Mahmood Ali ...
